playlists.description: The Platform, Badland and Beastars S1:E1

playlists.name: Black Mirror
playlists.description: Black Mirror episodes in their supposed timeline order. Based on this sensible and well explained timeline available here

playlists.name: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
playlists.description: A funny, light-hearted, story set in a post-apocalyptic earth with mutants and a good soundtrack.

playlists.name: WTF did I just watch!?
playlists.description: Tiger King, Evil Genius, The Legend of Cocaine Mountain and other off-the-wall shenanigans.

playlists.name: Star Trek TNG - Data
playlists.description: WIP. All the Star Trek TNG episodes about or with a heavy focus on Data.

playlists.name: Star Trek - the ones with the holodeck
playlists.description: Some of the best holodeck episodes from the various Star Trek series.

playlists.name: Pokemon Kanto
playlists.description: Pokemon Kanto, but with just the gym battles and new Pokemon Ash catches - no fluff.
